flawed_nl_solution:
Malcolm has 240 followers + 500 followers = <<240+500=740>>740 followers on Instagram and Facebook.
He has 740 followers / 2 = <<740/2=730>>730 followers on Twitter.
He has 730 followers x 3 = <<730*3=2190>>2190 followers on Tiktok.
He has 2190 followers + 510 followers = <<2190+510=2700>>2700 followers on Youtube.
Altogether, Malcolm has 740 followers + 730 followers + 2190 followers + 2700 followers = <<740+730+2190+2700=6360>>6360 followers on social media.
#### 6360

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 370, not 730. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
